description: The diagnosis for an English welder jailed for breaching Manx rules led to prison visits being halted.
title: Doncaster welder's positive Covid-19 test halted Manx jail visits
title_page: Doncaster welder's positive Covid-19 test halted Manx jail visits - BBC News
maintext: Under Manx Covid-19 laws, only residents and those with special permission can enter the island and anyone who tests positive for the virus must self-isolate for 14 days.
